General.Name: AB S.A.
General.Description: AB S.A., together with its subsidiaries, distributes IT products primarily in Poland, the Czech Republic, and Slovakia. It assembles, wholesales, retails, imports, exports, and repairs computers, telecommunications, multimedia, computer hardware, toys, and electronic equipment, as well as household appliances; develops and trades in software products; and operates warehouses. The company also offers IT devices, servers and networks, phones and GPS, photo and optics, household goods, TV sets, home cinema sets, car stereos, voice recorders, Hi-Fi equipment, multimedia players, blueray / DVD players, office equipment and supplies, lighting, toys, fitness and sport, construction and assembly, automotive, and home products. In addition, it provides printing services, and marketing and training activities. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Magnice, Poland.
